document_data.name: Kadari
document_data.mainbody: '''Kadari''' was the language of the empire of [[Kadar]],<ref> and the [[Necromancer Kings]] of [[Sahu]]. As of [[1367 DR]]{{AQ-time}} it was a dead language known by very few.{{Cite dragon/Speaking in Tongues|29}}
document_data.Known works in Kadari:
*[[Kitab al-Asfr]], a [[spellbook]] of the infamous [[geomancer]] [[Balshareska]] in form of a [[papyrus]] [[scroll]], containing [[Divine magic|divine]] and [[arcane magic]]{{Cite dragon/250/Arcane Lore: Secrets of the Arch-Geomancer}}
*The ''[[Art of Necromancy]]'' by necromancer and scholar [[Kazerabet]] contained a Kadari translation dictionary.

Kadari dictionary.Zaribel: AngelThe source does not make it entirely clear that this name is in Kadari, not [[Midani language|Midani]].
